statements: SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customer_information;
SELECT customer_email, customer_phone FROM customer_information WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customer_information WHERE customer_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_information ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_address FROM customer_information WHERE customer_phone = '123-456-7890';
SELECT * FROM customer_information WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_information WHERE customer_id > 100 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_information WHERE customer_address LIKE '%New York%' LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customer_information WHERE customer_email LIKE '%@gmail.com%' AND customer_phone IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM customer_information WHERE customer_id BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY customer_id ASC, customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customers ORDER BY last_name DESC
SELECT * FROM email_templates WHERE template_name = 'Welcome Email'
SELECT template_id, template_name FROM email_templates WHERE template_name LIKE '%Reminder%'
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY first_name ASC
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE first_name = 'John';
SELECT template_name, template_body FROM email_templates WHERE template_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY last_name DESC, first_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, city FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customers WHERE state='NY';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE quantity_available > 0 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 100 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE state = 'California' ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, city FROM customers WHERE state = 'Texas' ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, description, price FROM products WHERE quantity_available > 0 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE city='New York';
SELECT order_id, total_amount, status FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category='Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT response_text, response_date FROM email_responses ORDER BY response_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 3;

SELECT orders.order_id, customers.name, orders.total_amount, products.product_name FROM orders JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.customer_id JOIN purchase_history ON orders.order_id = purchase_history.order_id JOIN products ON purchase_history.product_id = products.product_id WHERE purchase_history.quantity > 2;
SELECT customers.name, SUM(orders.total_amount) AS total_spent FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id GROUP BY customers.name HAVING total_spent > 1000;

SELECT products.product_name, AVG(purchase_history.quantity) AS avg_quantity_sold FROM products JOIN purchase_history ON products.product_id = purchase_history.product_id GROUP BY products.product_name ORDER BY avg_quantity_sold DESC;

SELECT customers.name, count(email_responses.response_id) AS num_responses FROM customers LEFT JOIN email_responses ON customers.customer_id = email_responses.customer_id GROUP BY customers.name ORDER BY num_responses DESC;
